job_description: Overview:Are you a junior or senior pursuing your Bachelor's degree, or a graduate student pursuing an advanced degree, looking for corporate work experience as a paid intern? We're looking for an intern to join our high energy fast paced IT Team. We are looking for an intern who can join our technical services team gaining valuable IT experience. We are looking for an intern with a passion for technology, self-motivated, and great work ethic that can work in an environment that promotes fast paced learning while promoting a fun work environment.Essential Functions:Learn and support a corporate IT environment, which will include, but is not olimited toDesktop, Laptop, Software supportPrinter SupportBasic networking and systems troubleshootingContributing to the advancement of Ravenâ€™s securityComplete IT related projectsAttend Raven University trainings and seminarsWork closely with your assigned mentor to a successful completion of internshipComplete summer end intern presentation
job_requirements: Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:College student or recent graduate with a background in an IT related fieldAbility to handle and manage multiple projects and tasks simultaneously, without close supervisionAbility to communicate effectively, both orally and in writingAbility to establish and maintain effective working relationships with team membersGeneral understanding of computers, networks, and systemsAbility to critically think through difficult projects and situation providing a resolution or solutionAbility to work with a high level of confidentialityOpen To All Majors:No
